Text: Call in Your Email Messages ToDos and More Palm Solutions brought to you by InSync Online Call in Your Email Messages ToDos and More Dear Jess Finally the signed contract is in your hot little hand Now for the real workstarting with half a dozen emails and a mental todo list as long as your arm Of course none of it will wait until you get back to the office Say hello to Copytalk Just call the tollfree Copytalk number from any phone to dictate email messages todos appointments contacts and expense items Its like leaving a voicemail for a trusted assistant to handle Except its a lot less expensive With Copytalk email messages arrive in the recipients inbox as if sent from your desktop Items appear in the appropriate application on your Palmtm IIIx handheld Just hit the HotSyncr button or connect via wireless modem You dont need special instructions to use Copytalk Or to train it to recognize your voice Copytalks human editors proof every item you call in To get one FREE month of Copytalk and your special Palm customer rate go to Copytalk udhkeycvRecxb The InSync Online Team The content of this message is based on your personal InSync Online profile To modify your profile or unsubscribe from InSync Online return to your InSync Online profile by clicking on the link below Or unsubscribe by replying to this message with unsubscribe as the subject line of the message C Palm Inc All rights reserved udiEeycvRecxQ Palmcom udzEeycvRecxV Palm Store udnkeycvRecxK InSync Online insyncdynisZVae MyPalm udrkeycvRecxE
